markdown:
[certbot](https://certbot.eff.org/lets-encrypt/debianbuster-nginx)

en fait, c'est hyper simple...

1. ```certbot --nginx```

voilà, ensuite on suit tranquillement 

(apriori pour mes trucs node on peut choisir le truc redirect all to https)

```
Redirecting all traffic on port 80 to ssl in /etc/nginx/conf.d/anais.conf

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Congratulations! You have successfully enabled https://anais.cahut.net

You should test your configuration at:
https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/analyze.html?d=anais.cahut.net
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

IMPORTANT NOTES:
 - Congratulations! Your certificate and chain have been saved at:
   /etc/letsencrypt/live/anais.cahut.net/fullchain.pem
   Your key file has been saved at:
   /etc/letsencrypt/live/anais.cahut.net/privkey.pem
   Your cert will expire on 2020-09-01. To obtain a new or tweaked
   version of this certificate in the future, simply run certbot again
   with the "certonly" option. To non-interactively renew *all* of
   your certificates, run "certbot renew"
 - If you like Certbot, please consider supporting our work by:

   Donating to ISRG / Let's Encrypt:   https://letsencrypt.org/donate
   Donating to EFF:                    https://eff.org/donate-le
```
html:
certbot

en fait, c'est hyper simple...

  1. certbot --nginx

voilà, ensuite on suit tranquillement

(apriori pour mes trucs node on peut choisir le truc redirect all to https)

Redirecting all traffic on port 80 to ssl in /etc/nginx/conf.d/anais.conf

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Congratulations! You have successfully enabled https://anais.cahut.net

You should test your configuration at:
https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/analyze.html?d=anais.cahut.net
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

IMPORTANT NOTES:
 - Congratulations! Your certificate and chain have been saved at:
   /etc/letsencrypt/live/anais.cahut.net/fullchain.pem
   Your key file has been saved at:
   /etc/letsencrypt/live/anais.cahut.net/privkey.pem
   Your cert will expire on 2020-09-01. To obtain a new or tweaked
   version of this certificate in the future, simply run certbot again
   with the "certonly" option. To non-interactively renew *all* of
   your certificates, run "certbot renew"
 - If you like Certbot, please consider supporting our work by:

   Donating to ISRG / Let's Encrypt:   https://letsencrypt.org/donate
   Donating to EFF:                    https://eff.org/donate-le
